import React from "react" import Star from "elements/Star" import TestimonyAccent from "assets/images/testimonial-landingpage-frame.jpg" import Button from "elements/Button" import Fade from "react-reveal/Fade" export default function Testimony({ data }) { return (

{data.name}

{data.content}
{data.familyName}, {data.familyOccupation}
) }
